description: Adam jolts awake inside a boarded up infirmary with no recollection of who he is or how he ended up here.  With threatening sounds penetrating from the outside, Adam has no choice but to reach deep into his memories to try and piece together what has happened to him.  With the help of mementos he finds, Adam starts to piece together the puzzle that once was his life.  He remembers his best friend Clark, Clark's girlfriend Jess, and the love of his life Katie, but there are other memories as well… Memories that couldn't be his…
synopsis: A young man suffering from amnesia must dig deep into the far reaches of his mind to remember who he is and save the love of his life before a virus that has infected him takes over.
title: The Hive
